cards.question:
What is: Select your cookie preferences

We use essential c...?
cards.answer:
Select your cookie preferences

We use essential cookies and similar tools that are necessary to provide our site and services

cards.question: What is: We use performance cookies to collect anonymous st...?
cards.answer: We use performance cookies to collect anonymous statistics, so we can understand how customers use our site and make improvements

cards.question: What is: Essential cookies cannot be deactivated, but you c...?
cards.answer: Essential cookies cannot be deactivated, but you can choose “Customize” or “Decline” to decline performance cookies

cards.question: What is: If you agree, AWS and approved third parties will ...?
cards.answer: If you agree, AWS and approved third parties will also use cookies to provide useful site features, remember your preferences, and display relevant content, including relevant advertising

cards.question: What is: To accept or decline all non-essential cookies, ch...?
cards.answer: To accept or decline all non-essential cookies, choose “Accept” or “Decline

cards.question: What is: ” To make more detailed choices, choose “Customize...?
cards.answer: ” To make more detailed choices, choose “Customize
